# MLImageClassifier.ModelParameters.ClassifierType.logisticRegressor

**Case**

Logistic regression is a statistical model that classifies input feature vector into different categories.

## Declaration

```swift
case logisticRegressor
```

## Designating an algorithm’s classifier

- **MLImageClassifier.ModelParameters.ClassifierType.multilayerPerceptron(layerSizes:)**: Multilayer perceptron, layerSizes holds a list of positive integers that represent the number of hidden units in each layer. An additional fully connected layer with a Softmax activation output will be added that maps to probabilities of sound categories.
